channel.title: ZKM Script Classpath
channel.description:
Java is gay, tell me why this:
[code] [2010.09.08 16:24:29] Setting classpath...
FATAL ERROR: Attempt to use "unobfuscate" statement at line 3 with unusable classes : de.vxart.io.ZipEntryInputStream not found while looking for method '<init>(java.io.DataInputStream)' in class 'de.vxart.io.ZipEntryInputStream' which is referenced in class 'C:\Users\Paul\Desktop\Tools\Java\Deob2\deob.jar!class\a.class'.
Check the classpath option and reopen classes. (1a) [/code]
For script: [code] open "deob.jar"; classpath ".;C:\Users\Paul\Desktop\Tools\Java\Deob2\jzipupdate-0.9.jar"; unobfuscate; saveAll archiveCompression=all "."; [/code]

item.title: ZKM Script Classpath
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

Took out classpath in zkm script / added it to class path here:

java -cp ZKM/ZKM.jar;libraries/*.jar ZKM ZKM/script.txt

Worked fine. Whatever lol.

Read full topic

item.title: ZKM Script Classpath
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

Java is gay, tell me why this:

[2010.09.08 16:24:29] Setting classpath...

FATAL ERROR: Attempt to use "unobfuscate" statement at line 3 with unusable classes : de.vxart.io.ZipEntryInputStream 
not found while looking for method '<init>(java.io.DataInputStream)' in class 'de.vxart.io.ZipEntryInputStream'
which is referenced in class 'C:\Users\Paul\Desktop\Tools\Java\Deob2\deob.jar!class\a.class'. 

Check the classpath option and reopen classes. (1a)

For script:

open "deob.jar";
classpath ".;C:\Users\Paul\Desktop\Tools\Java\Deob2\jzipupdate-0.9.jar";         
unobfuscate;
saveAll archiveCompression=all ".";
